name: nasa-space-explorer
description: NASA Space Explorer - Full-stack web application showcasing NASA's space data

scripts.prebuild:all: node scripts/version.js bump build 'Build all packages'
scripts.build:all: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install
scripts.lint:all: cd frontend && npm run lint && cd ../backend && npm run lint
scripts.format:all: cd frontend && npm run format && cd ../backend && npm run format
scripts.test:unit: cd frontend && npm test -- --watchAll=false && cd ../backend && npm test
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
scripts.deploy:backend:heroku: cd backend && git push heroku main
scripts.deploy:all: npm run build:all && npm run deploy:backend:heroku && npm run deploy:frontend

author: Tony Casey
